name: Scrafty
description: As halfhearted as this Pokémon’s kicks may seem, they pack enough power to shatter Conkeldurr’s concrete pillars.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.

attacks.name: Bad Brawl
attacks.effect: If you played Piers from your hand during this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.
